page.title: 09Girl Guides in Dovercourt
page.content: {Mrs Dommett - a guider in Dovercourt My interest in Guiding began when I joined the Brownies at the age of seven.I went on to join the Guides at 11 yrs and obtained the Queen's Guide Badge at the age of 16. I became interested in leadership and I was made a Pack Leader of a Brownie Pack. Three years ago I was asked to help at a local Guide Company. After a year I became the Guide Leader. I now have my own helper and sixteen guides. They range in age from ten years to fifteen. Each Guide works for challenges set either by themselves or by the Guider. After each year, if the targets have been reached, they are awarded a Trefoil badge. Interest badges can also be gained, so that any individual talents or skills can be recognised by an award.
